```{r}
#| context: setup

library(nycflights13)
library(duckdb)
library(ggplot2)
data(flights)

dbcon <- dbConnect(duckdb())
duckdb::duckdb_register(dbcon, "flights", flights)
#num_rows <- dbExecute(dbcon, "create table flights as select * FROM 'data/flights-10m.parquet'")
carrier <- dbGetQuery(dbcon, "select distinct carrier from flights")
```

```{r}
sliderInput("distance", "Select Distance", min = 11, max=4962, value = 2000)
selectInput("carrier", "Select Carrier", choices=carrier, selected=carrier[1])
```

```{r}
plotOutput("flights_delay")
```


```{r}
#| context: server
flights_filtered <- reactive({
  carr <- as.character(input$carrier)
  distance <- input$distance
  query <- glue::glue_sql("select * from flights WHERE distance > {distance} and carrier = {carr}", .con = dbcon)
  
  print(query)
  out_frame <- dbGetQuery(conn = dbcon, statement = query)
  return(out_frame)
})

#output$flights_table <- renderTable(
#  knitr::kable(flights_filtered())
  
#)

output$flights_delay <- renderPlot({
  
  ggplot(flights_filtered(), aes(x=month, y=arr_delay)) +
    geom_point()
})

```
